DOC.brief_summary: With advance age testosterone level decline men . Low testosterone level plus certain symptom call `` Late Onset Hypogonadism ( LOH ) '' . Adipose tissue may contribute testosterone deficiency . On hand testosterone deficiency lead decrease lean body mass increase fat mass - one clinical sign / symptom LOH . Lifestyle change ( diet , exercise ) alone combination testosterone replacement ( TRT ) , influence symptom LOH . The aim study assess additional impact TRT Aging Male Symptom Score ( AMS ) adiposity ( waist circumference ) patient , diet exercise program .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Tolerability Testogel/Nebido Combination With Exercise Diet Hypogonadal Male Patients
DOC.criteria: Male patient > 35yrs Waist Circumference > 102cm Clinically biochemically confirm hypogonadism ( testosterone group ) Willingness attempt weight optimization Androgen dependent carcinoma prostate male mammary gland , past present history liver tumours hypersensitivity towards active pharmaceutical ingredient ingredient .
